item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description: I am <em>sooo</em> stealing the "karn-evil" bit. That's good stuff!
item.content:encoded: I am sooo stealing the “karn-evil” bit. That’s good stuff!

item.title: By: Kafka
item.dc:creator: Kafka
item.description:
Everyone's so down on Slashdot Games and Zonk's posts. Personally I'm with you on this... I like the effort that goes into some of the features and I try to help out by commenting in Games regularly.
I liked that I had already read most of the posts in the Carnival blogroll..makes me feel all validated and stuff. :-)
Cheers, Kafka
item.content:encoded:
Everyone’s so down on Slashdot Games and Zonk’s posts. Personally I’m with you on this… I like the effort that goes into some of the features and I try to help out by commenting in Games regularly.

I liked that I had already read most of the posts in the Carnival blogroll..makes me feel all validated and stuff. ðŸ™‚

Cheers,
Kafka
